apartment.name: Apartment
apartment.description: You're in a bright, sunny apartment. Records and books are strewn all around the room. There's some paper sitting on a table by the window.

items.name: Scraps of paper
items.description: Amongst old letters and newspaper clippings you see a hand-scrawled note. It says 'Meet me at the Foundation at midnight tonight'. What could it mean?

items.name: Books
items.description: The books look old and dog-eared. They seem to be in German.

items.name: Records
items.description: There are hundreds of records. None of the artists are familiar to you.

items.name: Cheese
items.description: It's just a bit of cheese

club_entrance.name: Foundation club entrance
club_entrance.description: You're outside the Foundation club. You can hear the thud of the music inside. The bouncer glowers at you.

conversation.text: It's a private party tonight. No entry without a ticket.

responses.message: Where can I get a ticket from?

club.name: Foundation club
club.description: You made it into the club! You win!
